# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily productivity and streamline your workflow. With its innovative features, this product has been highly rated by our previous customers, improving their efficiency by an average of 30%. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase this remarkable product for $75. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience! If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
